classmethod instantiate_nov(target_year, carbon_tax, fuel_co2_content, carbon_capture_rate, consider_leap_year)¶

Instantiate NOV class with test values. The additional parameters can be passed to test NOV under different carbon conditions.

test_nocarbon_leap_nov()¶

Test NOV outcome with no carbon and on a leap year.

test_nocarbon_noleap_nov()¶

Test NOV outcome with no carbon and no leap year.

test_with_carbon_noleap_nov()¶

Test NOV outcome with carbon and not on a leap year.
